comment.body:
This is a bit of a vague question, which makes it difficult to answer, it also has some elements of the chicken or the egg debate. Are furries omnipresent in general? Or are they only omnipresent on the internet?

For a simplified, inaccurate, opinionated answer- The internet was founded in western civilization, a civilization whose children are indoctrinated by Disney from a very early age. Therefore blame accesibility to the internet & Disney movies.
